title: Automattic
extract: Automattic Inc. is a web development corporation founded in August 2005. It is most notable for WordPress.com (a free blogging service), as well as its contributions to WordPress (open source blogging software). ... Automattic raised US$317.3 million in five funding rounds.
extract_html: Automattic Inc. is a web development corporation founded in August 2005. It is most notable for WordPress.com (a free blogging service), as well as its contributions to WordPress (open source blogging software). ... Automattic raised US$317.3 million in five funding rounds.
